channel.title: Holidays on Family Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Holidays on Family Recipes

item.title: Cheesecake Thumbprint Cookies
item.description: Ingredients For the cheesecake filling 4 ounces cream cheese, softened 1/4 cup granulated sugar 1/8 teaspoon salt 1 large egg yolk 1 1/2 teaspoons sour cream 1/4 teaspoon vanilla For the cookie dough 16 tablespoons (1 cup) unsalted butter, softened 1/4 cup granulated sugar 1/4 teaspoon salt 1 large egg yolk 2 cups all-purpose flour Recipe In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until light and fluffy. Beat in sugar and salt until smooth.

item.title: Mushroom Gravy
item.description: Ingredients 3/4 cup of chopped button mushrooms 1 small onion 1/4 cup butter 2.5 cups vegetable broth 2 tbsp soy sauce 1/4 cup of flour 1 tbsp poultry seasoning Salt & pepper to taste Recipe Melt butter in skillet and add onion and mushrooms.Saute for two minutes over high heat. Reduce to medium heat and add broth and soy sauce. Add flour slowly and stir. Bring to a simmer and reduce heat.
